name: Diplomatic Overture
description: A neighboring kingdom reaches out to establish or improve diplomatic relations.
location: Choose or roll for a neighboring kingdom

criticalSuccess.msg: Relations improve by one step; if now Helpful, +{gold} gold and -{unrest} unrest

success.msg: Relations improve by one step (max Friendly without diplomatic structures)

failure.msg: No change in relations; minor diplomatic friction

criticalFailure.msg: Relations worsen by one step; +{unrest} unrest

ifUnresolved.name: Diplomatic Tension
ifUnresolved.description: The failed diplomatic overture has strained relations with neighboring kingdoms

onSuccess.msg: The diplomatic tension situation has been resolved!

onFailure.msg: Failed to resolve the diplomatic tension situation
